subject: Suits and Litigation
Madison Square Garden
Sexual Harassment
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Madison Square Garden has asked a federal judge to reduce a portion of the $11.6 million in punitive damages a jury assessed against it for sexually discriminating against a former Knicks executive.
snippet: Madison Square Garden has asked a federal judge to reduce a portion of the $11.6 million in punitive damages a jury assessed against it for sexually discriminating against a former Knicks executive.
